meanings.definition: Not attributed or credited to a particular source.
meanings.sent1: The unattributed painting was displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The book contained many unattributed quotes.
meanings.sent3: It was quite unattributed how the mysterious note appeared on her desk.
meanings.sent4: The unattributed music filled the room with an air of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The unattributed author's identity remained a secret.

meanings.definition: Not acknowledged or recognized as belonging to someone.
meanings.sent1: She found an unattributed gift on her doorstep.
meanings.sent2: The unattributed message left her puzzled.
meanings.sent3: The unattributed letter turned out to be a prank.
meanings.sent4: His unattributed talent shone through in his artwork.
